name: Mach Jumper
description:
Mach Jumper is a jump game that has action-oriented levels with an emphasis on speed and jump and a jumper moves forward a certain unknown distance.

3 powerful characters, pets, and various weapons are used to kill enemies and bosses and a jumper can move forward faster and more powerful by improving ability through upgrading.

In each stage, very powerful and fun enemies appear and different kinds of bosses will attack you with a variety of attack patterns. You will be excited and can compete with your friends.


Game Features: 
•3 different characters and 3 different pet
•A variety of items
•A variety of stages of game scaffolding
•Huge Boss (various patterns of attack) and enemies of full of personalities
•Three-step jump and dash
•Fast moving by the jet board
•Achievement
•Game Center leader board
•Multi-Play (Game Center, Bluetooth)
